description:

Everything you love, now at your fingertips!

SHEIN is an affordable online shopping platform offering rich items and trendy goods. Discovering pretty items, trying new things and sharing with others,  SHEIN is dedicated to meet all your needs in life and works as your one-stop shopping destination! We take pride in satisfying our customers and bringing them the best shopping experience.

Inspire yourself with SHEIN right now!

Save you more
- Register and get £3 includes sale
- Free limited-time delivery and free returns within 30 Days（*conditions apply）

Wide selections

Considerate services

The app needs the following access permissions when it is running on your device:

-	Optional permission(s):

o	Notification: it will allow us to send push notifications to your device.

o	Camera: the camera function is required when you need to capture photos and videos and upload them to the app.

o	Photo and video: it will enable you to upload photos and videos from your device to the app.

o	Location: where the relevant service is available, it enables location based services on your device. 
(This is not used in Korea.)

o	Calendar: it enables you to sync the SHEIN LIVE events to your device calendar. 

o	Microphone: when you try to capture videos using Camera function, the app will also need the microphone access permission to capture the voice. 

※ Even if you do not grant optional access permissions, you can still use SHEIN service, except for the functions related to those permissions.

developer: LC Waikiki Magazacilik Hizmetleri Ticaret A.S.
description:
Everyone Deserves to Dress Well!  

Welcome to the Official LC Waikiki Shopping App!  

We're here to help you dress according to your style and budget, ensuring you feel great. Our mission, 'Everyone Deserves to Dress Well,' invites you to the most stylish destination in fashion.  

If you want to stay up-to-date with fashion and trends, enjoy easy shopping anytime, anywhere! Download the LC Waikiki app to quickly and easily access all information about our leading brand in the clothing industry.  

The easiest way to stay trendy and shop smart is right here! Download our app now and express your style.  

With our LC Waikiki shopping app:  

- Access the trendiest products in women's, men's, kids’ and baby fashion; explore our wide range of home textiles, accessories, and gifts.  
- Activate notifications and stay updated on campaigns, exclusive discounts and surprises for the app, newly added products and fashion trends.  
- Use your favourite list to save all the products you like.  
- Shop quickly and securely with various payment options.  
- Track your orders and returns in each part of the process easily and quickly.

The My dm app has many attractive advantages and features!

Shopping with your smart handheld device? The My dm app has many attractive advantages, useful features and exciting services, and allows you to conveniently shop for your favourite products.

Log in using your existing My dm account. The app will then be tailored to your personal needs.

Download the app and get started
1. Download the My dm app to your smartphone
2. Log in with your My dm account credentials or register for a new customer account.

The best functions at a glance

Get an overview of the product range
Our search function, all the product categories and our scan function give you a quick and easy overview of the product range. Simply click through our assortment, search for specific brands or scan products, view products you’ve purchased previously, add them to your watch list, share your watch list with friends or shop directly.

Find your local store
You can search for stores near you with direct access to the store finder. This gives you quick and easy access to service information. You can save your preferred store in the app and thus display the available stock on the product pages in addition to the online availability.

Your opinion is what matters
We want to constantly improve our app. That’s why we welcome your feedback. Simply use our feedback section to let us know what you think. Please note that you will not receive confirmation when you send feedback. If you have any further questions or problems with the app, please refer to ‘Help & FAQs’ or use our contact form.

Ceo Lilly svet lepote i zdravlja na klik od vas.
Preuzmite besplatno Lilly aplikaciju i kupujte brzo i jednostavno.
Lako pretražite čitav asortiman, koristite svoju Loyalty karticu, ispratite akcije i sniženja, prelistajte kataloge i proverite dostupnost lekova i drugih proizvoda.
Šta sve možete sa Lilly aplikacijom:
- Brza i laka kupovina
- Vaša Loyalty kartica. Sakupljajte i trošite svoje cvetiće
- Akcije i katalozi
- Moja lista
- Dostupnost lekova po objektima
- Pretraga objekata
- Opisi i pretraga proizvoda
- Uštedite, kupujte pametno i lako uz Lilly aplikaciju.

Sa 3 miliona registrovanih korisnika i preko 6 miliona aktivnih oglasa u svakom trenutku, KupujemProdajem je najveća online zajednica za kupovinu i prodaju u Srbiji. Pored toga što najbrže možete da kupite ili prodate praktično sve, na KP možete pronaći i posao, ili oglasiti svoj konkurs.
Preuzmite našu zvaničnu iOS aplikaciju i:
· Postavljajte oglase sa telefona, brzo i jednostavno
· Lako pretražujte 6 miliona oglasa, iz više od 80 kategorija
· Čuvajte pretrage i budite obavešteni kada se pojave novi oglasi koji Vas zanimaju
· Kontaktirajte odmah kupce ili prodavce, KP Porukama ili telefonom
· Uređujte i brišite svoje oglase sa bilo kog mesta
· Postavite svoj oglas na vrh grupe direktno sa telefona
· Budite odmah obavešteni o statusu svojih oglasa i promocija
· Brzo pristupite konvertoru valuta
Nastavićemo da stalno unapređujemo aplikaciju, uz Vašu pomoć. Ukoliko imate predlog ili sugestiju, iskoristite opciju "Pomoć i kontakt" u Moj KP meniju.

developer: Lidl Digital International GmbH & Co. KG
description:
LIDL PLUS: Find Food Deals, Grocery Coupons and Shopping Rewards on the Products You Love! The service is aimed at customers who'd like to receive personalised information from Lidl Stiftung about Lidl Plus promotions, as well as offers, products and services from Lidl Companies and selected partners. We personalise this information based on your purchase and usage behaviour of the products and services of the Lidl Companies.

Incredible grocery discounts every time you shop with Lidl! ‘Straight in my basket!’ 

Download, register and save even more. Lidl Plus is our new rewards app, designed to give you discounts on the products you love. 

The service is aimed at customers who'd like to receive personalised information from Lidl Stiftung about Lidl Plus promotions, as well as offers, products and services from Lidl Companies and selected partners. We personalise this information based on your purchase and usage behaviour of the products and services of the Lidl Companies.

Available in Republic of Ireland, Northern Ireland, Great Britain and Malta. 

We’ll send you Lidl coupons based on the products that you love. Simply activate your coupons and scan in store to make incredible savings on your Lidl shopping. 

Every time you shop, you will also get the chance to win amazing prizes*. So what’s not to like? Check out the best things about the Lidl Plus loyalty app and how to use it.

HOW TO GET LIDL PLUS LOYALTY REWARDS:

 - Activate your coupons in the app and scan your digital Lidl Plus Card at the till to redeem and save money on your shop.
 - Scan your digital Lidl Plus Card at the till for the chance to win great prizes* on each store visit!
 -  Never lose a receipt again. You’ll get a purchase summary and a digital copy of your receipt with Lidl Plus.
 -  Never miss another offer. Browse through a digital version of our weekly leaflet in the app.

Plus many more exciting features!

We made this app to reward you for shopping at Lidl and to help you find deals on your favourite foods, drinks and household items. 

From amazing food coupons to saving money on your next shop – Lidl Plus is the app to download if you want to get the best food deals and shopping discounts. We’re always looking to help you enjoy quality products at great prices, so download our free loyalty app and register today and find food deals, shopping rewards and grocery coupons on the products you love.

*This feature is not available in all countries.

When joining the Lidl Plus program, you can allow tracking technology, which helps us to understand how you interact with the app. This includes what pages you visit, what coupons you view, and how long you spend on each page. This tracking allows Lidl Plus to improve the app and provide you with tailored communication, discounts and to participate in relevant surveys.

Data Protection Policy:

Discover the Zara collection with proposals for Women, Men and Kids. Through our application and our online store, you can shop and see all our new collections and fashion editorials for the upcoming seasons. 


Woman: 
Among Zara's proposals for women are the following categories of clothing and accessories: 
-	Shirts 
-	T-shirts/Bodysuits
-	Tops
-	Sweatshirts & Hoodies
-	Skirts
-	Trousers
-	Jeans

-	Bags

-	Perfume

-	Suits


Man:
The Zara Collection for men includes:

-	Trousers

Kids:
A selection for garments, accessories and shoes for: 
-	Girl: 6–⁠14 years
-	Boy: 6–⁠14 years
-	Baby girl: 9 months - 6 years
-	Baby boy: 9 months - 6 years
-	Newborn: 0-12 months
	
In addition, Zara's children's collection includes its Edited/customisable section, a selection of customisable clothing and accessories that is updated weekly. 


In addition to our permanent collections, with our Zara App you can find all our special launches, our beauty category and our lingerie line. 

Other utilities of the Zara App are:  
-	Favourites: Use your favourites list to save all the clothes and accessories you like.
-	Easy, intuitive and fast tracking of orders and returns. Track your order in each part of the process. 
-	Find your nearest Zara store. 
-	Activate notifications and receive information about new arrivals, launchings, special collections... 


Store mode 
-	Use your application in ""store mode"" when you are shopping in any of our stores and use all its features to improve your experience. 


Zara QR:
Use your QR on the Zara App for: 
-	Having associated all of your purchases online and at physical stores. At a physical store, identify yourself at the till with your Zara QR code and request an e-receipt.
-	In-store returns for both online and in-store purchases.
-	Collect all of your online orders at a physical store.

The IKEA mobile app is where your inspiration comes to life. Find that cute armchair you saw at your friend’s place or look through thousands of products and ideas just for you - to make your space truly your own.

Whether you’re looking to buy online or in-store, the IKEA app is your perfect shopping companion.

Scan the products while you walk through the store  - and skip the checkout line.

Are you planning a big project or small home improvements? Save and organise your favourites in lists for later. They are ready when you are!

Found the perfect IKEA furniture or home decoration? Let us do the heavy lifting. Order home delivery and be informed every step of the way, by tracking your order easily in the app.

The IKEA app is also a convenient home for your IKEA Family benefits. Access your IKEA Family card quickly and find all your past receipts conveniently in one location.

IKEA values your data privacy and believes in ethical use of customer data. That’s why you’re in control of all your data at all times.

Tap in to our fashion feed, anytime, anywhere, and all in one spot — the H&M app. 
Get instant updates, track your orders, use your own photos to find similar items in stock, and get inspired by our users all over the world! 

Imagine yourself browsing our feed and experiencing it live all at the same time.
Sounds exciting? Keep reading!

What if you found an item in our app and wanted you to know if it’s available in any of our stores? We have the answer to that — use our FIND IN STORE feature! This feature will show you all available sizes and colours and where we currently have them in stock.

Our app also comes handy when you’re already inside one of our stores.
Let’s say you can’t find your size or would like to know if an item is available in more sizes and colours? Scan the price tag — our SCAN & FIND feature will let you know!

Seen something you like and got inspired by? VISUAL SEARCH lets you explore what we have to offer by using your own photos or screen shots. It recognizes patterns, colors, styles, and gives you a list of matching or similar items in stock.

Save the items you love the most in your own list of favourites — just tap the HEART ICON. 

Turn the H&M app into your own shopping tool — activate IN-STORE MODE when you visit one of our stores. See which of your favourite-marked items are available in the store you’re in, or nearby.

Keep up to date with the fashion world by activating PUSH NOTIFICATIONS! You’ll be the first to know when a designer collection drops and you’ll instantly be notified when we have special offers and events!

Don’t miss out — download the H&M app now!

When you download the H&M app, we will process your data in accordance with our Privacy Notice. For more details on this, please go to hm.com.

developer: Hangzhou Alibaba International Information Technology Co., Ltd.
description:
What is Alibaba.com?
Alibaba.com is one of the world’s leading B2B ecommerce marketplaces. Our app allows you to source products from global suppliers, all from the convenience of your mobile device.

Purchase with confidence
Our Trade Assurance service protects your orders and payments on the platform, letting you purchase securely and conveniently with extended support.

Customizable products
Meet suppliers with years of customization and order fulfillment experience for sellers on Amazon, eBay, Wish, Etsy, Mercari, Lazada, and more.

Easy sourcing
Discover millions of ready-to-ship products in every industry category. Tell suppliers what you need and get quotes quickly with Request for Quotation services.

Fast shipping
Alibaba.com partners with major freight forwarders to provide land, sea, and air shipping solutions with on-time delivery services, end-to-end tracking, and competitive prices.

Livestreams and factory tours
Interact with manufacturers in real-time via product demos and tours of manufacturing facilities, providing insight and oversight on how your products are made.

Popular categories and trade shows
Source a wide range of popular items – from trending consumer goods to raw materials – and join our annual trade shows for niche product highlights and discounts.

Quality control
Choose Alibaba.com Production Monitoring and Inspection Services to reduce production delay and quality risks.

Discounts and promotions
Unlock new discounts and promotions from featured manufacturers and suppliers.

Stay updated
Use the Alibaba.com app to stay up to date on new products and promotions from your favorite suppliers.

Language and currency support
Alibaba.com supports 16 languages and 140 local currencies. Use our real-time translator to communicate with sellers in your mother tongue.

Moj Maxi aplikacija nagrađuje tvoju vernost brojnim pogodnostima: 
- U svakom trenutku možeš da pratiš koliko štediš
- Svake nedelje čeka te preko 50 proizvoda na akciji 
- Uz personalizovanu ponudu čekaju te popusti na proizvodima kreiranim prema tvojim potrebama - vaučeri za gratis proizvode ili popust na omiljene brendove
- Nudimo ti mogućnost da deliš nalepnice sa čak više različitih kupona u isto vreme
- Izborom omiljene prodavnice možeš da pratiš specijalne ponude promocije u toj prodavnici
- Rođendanski poklon

Discover our App for a complete experience: explore new items, add your favorite garments, enjoy the best looks, and shop with just one click.

Stradivarius is the online women's clothing store you've been searching for. A brand that adapts to current fashion trends. All the summer, spring, winter, and autumn trends at your fingertips. Welcome to the Stradivarius App.

With the Stradivarius app, you will receive the most anticipated notifications so you can stay trendy and not miss the garment of the moment. We have different types of sections: New Collection, Clothing, STR Teen, Shoes, Accessories, and much more.

STRADIVARIUS, the online clothing store for women. All the benefits of our app include:

  - STORE LOCATOR: Find all the outfits and best looks at your nearest store by activating geolocation on your device. Are you ready to go shopping at your nearest store? Remember, if you prefer, you can always shop directly in our online stores or from the Stradivarius app.

  - QR CODE AND VOICE SEARCH: Scan the QR code on the tag of the look you are searching for or use voice search to find the perfect outfit.

  - E-TICKET: Use the electronic ticket option to save all your online purchases in your app.

  - TRACKING NOTIFICATIONS: Enable automatic notifications to stay up-to-date on all news, fashion trends, new looks, and when your order will arrive.

  - WISHLIST: Add your favorite outfits and online clothes to your wishlist to create the best looks of the season.

  - ONE-CLICK PURCHASE: Save your credit or debit card to make purchases in the Stradivarius app with a single click.

  - MANAGE YOUR PROFILE: From the app, you can manage your personal data, address, favorite stores, and reservations you have made at Stradivarius physical stores.

The filter in the app is available to easily find the latest trends: clothing, shoes, accessories... save your favorite outfits to your wishlist and shop for all the clothes in our online or physical stores.

Show off the best looks and outfits with Stradivarius discounts at all our stores!

Discover a new way to shop online for women's clothing and also create a wishlist with your favorite looks, outfits, and fashion.

Shop online easily and find the best women's looks in the online store, manage your orders, and complete your favorite fashion outfits. You'll find dresses, t-shirts, shirts, jeans, pants, shoes, and any accessory— the best looks for this season!

Haven't downloaded the Stradivarius app yet?

Choose the best online clothes to combine your outfits, stay fashionable and comfortable every day. You can also create a wishlist with your favorite online clothing and the best looks, pay in stores, and find the best outfits at the nearest stores.

Don't wait any longer and download the Stradivarius app, your favorite online clothing store with the latest trends in fashion.

Black Friday starts here — score huge deals on the AliExpress app right now. AliExpress brings millions of items across fashion, electronics, home, beauty and more, all in one easy app so you can grab Black Friday discounts, flash sales and app-only coupons.

Find top brands, unique finds and everyday essentials at great prices. Read honest buyer reviews, compare sellers, and use smart search and filters to find exactly what you want. With AliExpress you get personalized recommendations, saved wishlists, price-drop alerts and curated collections tailored to your tastes.

We make shopping safe and simple. AliExpress protects your purchase with secure payments, buyer protection and easy returns. Track orders in real time, get delivery updates, and choose fast shipping options when you need items quickly. Chat with sellers or our support team right from the app.

Don’t miss limited-time Black Friday deals, exclusive app offers and flash events — AliExpress updates promotions constantly so you can save more. Whether you’re hunting for gifts, seasonal styles, or must-have gadgets, AliExpress puts endless choice and value in your pocket.

Download the AliExpress app today, join millions of shoppers, and enjoy worry-free shopping during Black Friday and all year round. Great finds and huge savings are just a tap away on AliExpress.

Comprehensive

Quickly search, get product details, read reviews and purchase millions of products available from Amazon and other merchants.

Convenient
Sign in with your existing Amazon account to access your basket, payment and shipping options. No need to create a new account to manage your 1-Click settings and wish lists, track your orders and use your Prime membership benefits. Shop just as you do on the web.

Fast
Compare prices and check availability instantly by scanning a barcode, snapping a picture or typing your search. 

Secure
All purchases are routed through Amazon's secure servers.

Universal
Shop Amazon.co.uk, Amazon.de, Amazon.es, Amazon.fr, Amazon.com, Amazon.it, Amazon.cn or Amazon.co.jp, Amazon.sg from a single app.

For customers located within the European Union, United Kingdom or Brazil: By using this app, you agree to Amazon’s Conditions of Use applicable for your country. Please also see the applicable Privacy Notice, Cookies Notice and Interest-Based Ads Notice for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.
 
For all other customers: By using this app, you agree to the applicable Amazon Conditions of Use (e.g. www.amazon.com/conditionsofuse) and Privacy Notice (e.g. www.amazon.com/privacy) for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.

Shop thousands of high-quality sportswear, workout clothes, and cutting-edge sports equipment for kids and adults at unbeatable prices, all from the palm of your hand. Our collection caters to everyone, whether you consider yourself to besemi-pro, a casual participant, or a complete beginner. Discover world-renowned brands such as Adidas, Nike, ASICS, Timberland, Puma, and more.

Download the Decathlon Shopping App now for exclusive offers, browse our vast product range, and enjoy a smooth, secure checkout. You can also earn an extra 2000 membership points worth £3 on your next purchase on our App as a Decathlon member. With Decathlon, you get tailored push notifications, ensuring you only hear about products and promotions you care about. Shop comfortably from home, review your purchase history, and enhance your in-store experience with our extensive product catalogue and quick barcode scans.

Ananas šoping mol a na netu omogućava ti da kupuješ bilo kad, bilo gde i da nađeš sve na jednom mestu. U ovoj aplikaciji možeš pronaći više od milion različitih proizvoda, u preko 30 kategorija - sve što ti treba. Isprobaj glasovnu pretragu, sigurno će te oduševiti. A tu su i posebne ponude i dodatni popusti samo za korisnike ananas aplikacije.




Obezbedili smo sigurno i bezbedno plaćanje platnim karticama na platformi, gotovinom tj. pouzećem prilikom preuzimanja paketa, uplatnicom ili skeniranjem IPS koda. A tu je i plaćanje na rate uz Banka Intesa platne kartice.



Svi proizvodi s oznakom „a brzo“ do tvojih kućnih vrata stižu u roku od jednog ili dva radna dana. Pored toga, svoj paket možeš da preuzmeš na ananas paketomatu na NIS benzinskim pumpama ili preuzmeš u ananas paket zoni - mreži maloprodajnih objekata (kafići, manje trgovinske radnje, menjačnice...). Kako tebi najviše odgovara. (Isporuku vršimo samo na teritoriji Republike Srbije)


Pojednostavili smo i vraćanje robe i reklamacija. U prvih 14 dana, od dana prijema paketa, možeš da vratiš proizvod bez ikakvih dodatnih objašnjenja. Jedini uslov je da proizvod ne bude korišćen.




Preuzmi ananas aplikaciju i uživaj u kupovini.



Ananas. Klik! Bum! Tras!

Opšti uslovi kupovine - https://ananas.rs/opsti-uslovi-kupovine
Politika Privatnosti - https://ananas.rs/politika-privatnosti
Politika o kolačićima (za web sajt) - https://ananas.rs/politika-o-kolacicima

Direct4.me is a new way of safe and contactless delivery of your packages. Through the mobile app it allows you to have a total control over your packages. Say goodbye to notices left on your door about unsuccessful delivery, chasing the courier or worse, waiting in line for your package at the Post office, and say hello to a solution that brings your online purchases straight to your door. 

Track the shipment
When your package is routed to the smart parcel locker, you will be immediately notified when it’s available for pickup. Anyone can deliver to the smart locker at any time and you can pick it up whenever is best for you. 

Authorize a friend 
You can authorize your friend or family member to use your locker. Access can be granted as permanent, time limited or for a single package. This way, the package can be retrieved for you by your younger sister or your grandma 

Drop off your package
Want to leave the notes for a school exam for your friend? Or maybe you engage in online trade? The smart locker can be used as contactless pickup point. Create a new shipment, describe the content, enter the mobile number of the recipient and drop the package in the locker. The recipient will be notified immediately that the package is waiting in your locker and you can go about your business as you please. 

Privacy and safety 
Never worry if there is a package for you in the locker, as only you can open the locker or a person that you authorize. Furthermore, if you’d like to buy a secret gift for a loved one, you can set up the process so only you will receive notifications and permission to open the locker. 

Do you have additional questions? Write to us at  support@direct4.me

Are you always searching for the latest trends? Do you love discovering new outfits? 
Do you always go for looks that are a hit wherever you go? Then this is the place for you! 

Download the Bershka app now and discover a new way of buying clothes and fashion online, view fashion items on a daily basis, see the latest trends for him and for her, manage your account and find the nearest stores.


THE COMPLETE BERSHKA CATALOGUE IS WITHIN REACH 


With the Bershka app, you will get access to the online store and can buy clothes in the most comfortable way, get the latest news, the latest fashion trends and items, women’s clothing (dresses, coats, shirts, skirts, blouses, boots…) men’s clothing (trousers, shirts, jackets, t-shirts, shoes…) and accessories (bags, purses, jewellery, belts…) as well as beauty and make-up. 

CREATE A WISH LIST WITH ALL THE ITEMS YOU LOVE 

You can do more than just buy clothes. You can also look at the complete catalogue, select the items that you like the most, choose complete outfits, and make a list of the latest trends for your next shopping trip - choose what you love best! 

MANAGE YOUR ACCOUNT 

With the app, you can do more than just buy clothes. 
You can also manage your orders, keep track of your online purchases, contact the customer service team if you have any questions and recommend the app to your friends. 

DISCOVER THE STORES CLOSEST TO YOU 

Thanks to geolocation, the app can tell you where the nearest store is and whether the store sells womenswear, menswear or both, and also provides you with a contact number for the store in case you want to order a specific item. You can also save your favourite items to a list and access them immediately if necessary.


EVERYTHING YOU CAN DO WITH THE BERSHKA APP

√ Discover the latest fashion trends
With the app, you can quickly see which clothes will be in fashion each season.
√ Buy all the catalogue items 
Choose the clothes you love and buy them! You only have to choose your payment method, enter the delivery address and wait for your order to arrive as quickly as possible.
√ Create a wish list with the items you love the most 
You can find out which clothes and accessories are on-trend and you can also save the items you like the most to a wish list. You can add items for women and men in the app with a QR code or with a scanner. 
√ Manage your account 
Via your user account, you can review your purchases, track your orders and contact the customer service department with any questions you may have.
√Find new places to shop
The app shows you a list of the nearest stores. You can also see their location on the map and add them to your favourites list or view their details (contact phone number, if they sell womenswear, menswear or both, and the exact address)


Do you like to dress in the latest fashion? Do you like to buy clothes, shoes and accessories for women and men directly from your mobile? Do you want to see all the orders you have placed? Do you want to discover new stores? In that case, the Bershka app is exactly what you have been looking for. 

It’s much more than an online store.

Discover the collection from Massimo Dutti on our new app. Enjoy the updated designs and exclusive features while keeping up to date with all the latest new arrivals, trending fashions, footwear and accessories for women and men.

** Personal experience **
- Create your personal account and enjoy an exclusive and customised online shopping experience.
- Save your favourite items, purchase them at a later time and access them from any device. 
- Manage all your purchases and keep track of your orders.
- Modify and save your personal and payment details at any time. 
- Handle your returns with ease.

** Trends and new arrivals **
- New launches. Access our ‘New In’ grid and discover our weekly new arrivals wherever you are. 
- Browse our website and discover all the season’s collections.
- Editorials. Get inspired by our editorials for women and men in the ‘Discover’ tab or on the home page.
- Access our ‘Paper’ and immerse yourself in a digital fashion and style experience.

** Exclusivity **
- Be the first to access our exclusive pre-sales and limited collections on our app. 

** Stay up to date **
- Enable notifications and receive information on our new arrivals, trends and promotions. 

** Services and features on the app **
- Enjoy a fast, simple and intuitive online shopping experience. 
- Use the search tool to find the garment you're looking for.
- Quick filter. Filter your searches by size, colour, characteristics, etc. to quickly find the model you’re looking for.
- Enjoy free in-store deliveries and returns on all your purchases. 
- Use our app in our physical stores. Access the Scan & Shop service, scan the barcode of any garment, pay for it online and receive your order wherever you want. 
- Share the garments you like the most with your friends or on social networks using the ‘Share’ option in the information tab.

** Catalogue **
Browse our app and discover all our products:

- Coats, jackets, raincoats, blazers, shirts and blouses, tops, T-shirts, sweaters and cardigans
- Dresses, suits, jumpsuits and skirts
- Trousers, jeans, Bermuda shorts, shorts, chinos
- Personal Tailoring: suits, shirts and blazers
- Handbags, crossbody bags, tote bags, purses, backpacks, wallets and toiletry bags
- Footwear: casual shoes, smart shoes, boat shoes, sandals, boots, ankle boots, trainers, loafers and espadrilles
- Accessories: jewellery, belts, scarves, sunglasses, cufflinks and braces, ties and pocket squares, boxers and socks
